"Shirayuki": "Folks have been keeping a close eye on you."
"Well, we can't just let you have all the fun, right?"
"As you are right now, I think it's safe to say you're pretty much unbeatable."
"But war doesn't rest. We can't neglect our training."
"So, I bring to you a proposal."
"Why not polish your skills to the limit?"
"Why not push a Class to its extreme?"
"How high does your ceiling go, exactly? That'd be a sight to behold."
"...I see. So that's what you look like at your strongest..."
"Oh, I can tell. Even without seeing you move, I know that look."
"Hehe... You really are just full of surprises. I'd expect nothing less of an ARKS recognized by Commander Guren."
"I can't let you have all the fun, though. I'll train diligently so I don't fall behind you."
"Hehe... You really are just full of surprises. I'd expect nothing less of an ARKS recognized by Commander Guren."
"I'll also train diligently so I don't fall behind. Let's keep improving."
